column5: Condolences.  Sometimes life just ain't fair.......
Indeed a shame Doug, my condolences to you and your family.
Very sorry to hear of the loss of your Dad. Condollences to you and your family
My condolences. My heart goes out to you and your family.
That's lousy news Doug, condolances from my home to yours.
My condolences
Heartfelt condolences.  That's very sad news.

Very sad news...Condolenses to you and your family.  I broke down and finally got a flu shot last year for the first time in my life!!.....after reading what happened to you Dad, it will be the last!!!  Thanks for educating me....

My deepest condolences to you and your family.  What a nasty way to die.  As for the flu shots, or any shot, there is always the possibility of an adverse, and potentially lethal, reaction to any injection.
Sorry for the loss of your father, hopefully good memories will help you through the bad times.
Wow thats terrible.  Sorry for your loss.
So sorry to hear this news...my condolences to you and your family...and to all that knew him.
Sorry to hear about your loss Doug
SO SORRY to hear about this, it's just terrible... Our family will be thinking of you guys.... thank you very much for posting this, as others have said it's not something you hear of in the media...
Very sorry to hear that, Corvette1, my condolences to you and your family
Sorry to hear about your dad Doug.  Sincerest condolences to you and your family.
I'm so sorry for your loss. Having something that is meant to make things better for the elderly go so wrong, is just not right.
That's terrible, never got the flu shot myself and won't be anytime soon. Sorry to hear about your loss.
oh wow Im very sorry for your loss.
Sincerest condolences to you and your family.
Sorry to hear of your loss, thoughts and prayers from my family to yours
Real sorry to hear that Doug.My condolences.   Paul.
WOW!!! What the Hell? My condolences to you and yours....
thanks for all the kind words it relly does help thanks
Wow im so sorry to hear this news.. I too dont get the shots, now im glad I dont...
My condolences as well...
two weeks ago my dad went in for a flu shot two day's later he got Guillain-Barré Syndrome please read the paper work  first before you get the shot 1 in 50,000 get Guillain-Barré Syndrome
Sorry to hear about your dad. Our sympathies go out to you and your family.
Wow, my condolences to you and your familly
OMG...  That terrible...  Sorry for your loss...  Never liked the flu shot... I'll take my chances...

so, so sorry for your loss Corvette1, I have no words that express my feelings. My dad also had a reaction to meds and died a few years ago so I understand a small bit of what you're going through. Stay strong for everyone else and they'll be there for you as well.

So sorry to hear my friend.  Of all the things in the world that you think can take a person down and something that was supposed to protect does the opposite.  God Speed to your father and all the best to you and yours as you work your way thru this.
Wow! So sorry to hear about your loss.  I've never had a flu shot myself... this story makes it likely that I never will.
OMG Corvette! That is horrible! I am very sorry for your loss.

That is why I don't get the flu shot.  My Dr. also got Guillain Barre from the flu shot but lived so does not give me a hard time about it.  Very sorry for your loss.  My condolances to you and your family.
Wow Doug that's bloody awful.  My sincerest condolences. If you'd like to get out fishing in the next little while and maybe go over that map just let me know.
Very sorry to hear that Corvy...my condolences.
Our thoughts and prayers to you and your family.  I am so very sorry for your loss!
My condolences, man. That's rough.
My condolences to you and your family. So very sorry for your loss.
That's a really rough break, Bud. I guess it's something they don't publicize all that much. Sincerest condolences to you and your family.
I am so sorry for your loss. My thoughts are with you and your family.
What a senseless loss! My condolences.
Sorry to hear about your loss....our thoughts and prayers are with you and your family.  Bob
My condolences.
Sorry to here that. My condolence's
Wow I am so sorry to here of your loss there are not any words to put together that would make justice for this so I will just send my condolences to you and your family.
You have our best ........  Ron & Beverly
You and your families have our deepest sympathy as well.   Stay strong my friend.
sorry to hear that doug,thats terrible..its just not right my condolences to you and your family
Very sorry to hear of this news
